snippet: The death of an ozone researcher brings to mind the work of Arie Jan Haagen-Smit, who did seminal work on smog. The attacks that both suffered before they were vindicated raises the question of whether climate scientists will one day be widely...
abstract: The death of an ozone researcher brings to mind the work of Arie Jan Haagen-Smit, who did seminal work on smog. The attacks that both suffered before they were vindicated raises the question of whether climate scientists will one day be widely appreciated.

headline.main: A Reminder That Science Can Override Pressure
